)VALUES(

mapper.update:
UPDATE ts_car_processing
register_time=#{registerTime},
register_user_id=#{registerUserId},
is_register=#{isRegister},
query_result=#{queryResult},
query_time=#{queryTime},
query_user_id=#{queryUserId},
is_query=#{isQuery},
verify_result=#{verifyResult},
verify_time=#{verifyTime},
verify_user_id=#{verifyUserId},
record_number=#{recordNumber},
recycle_number=#{recycleNumber},
is_verify=#{isVerify},
data_upload_time=#{dataUploadTime},
data_uploaduser_id=#{dataUploaduserId},
is_data_upload=#{isDataUpload},
dismantle_time=#{dismantleTime},
dismantle_user_id=#{dismantleUserId},
is_dismantle=#{isDismantle},
pic_upload_time=#{picUploadTime},
pic_upload_user_id=#{picUploadUserId},
is_pic_upload=#{isPicUpload},
print_recycle_time=#{printRecycleTime},
print_recycle_user_id=#{printRecycleUserId},
is_print_recycle=#{isPrintRecycle},
is_logout=#{isLogout},
logout_result=#{logoutResult},
logout_time=#{logoutTime},
logout_user_id=#{logoutUserId},
is_appoint_time=#{isAppointTime},
is_appoint_userid=#{isAppointUserid},
is_appoint_logout_time=#{isAppointLogoutTime},
procedure_issue_time=#{procedureIssueTime},
procedure_issue_user_id=#{procedureIssueUserId},
register_address=#{registerAddress},
is_procedure_issue=#{isProcedureIssue},
grant_car_receipt_user_id=#{grantCarReceiptUserId},
grant_car_receipt_time=#{grantCarReceiptTime},
is_grant_car_receipt=#{isGrantCarReceipt},
print_car_ledger_user_id=#{printCarLedgerUserId},
print_car_ledger_time=#{printCarLedgerTime},
is_print_car_ledger=#{isPrintCarLedger},
print_output_user_id=#{printOutputUserId},
printout_put_time=#{printoutPutTime},
is_printout_put=#{isPrintoutPut},
print_cancel_prove_user_id=#{printCancelProveUserId},
print_cancel_prove_time=#{printCancelProveTime},
print_count=#{printCount},
print_ledger_batch=#{printLedgerBatch},
is_print_cancel_prove=#{isPrintCancelProve},
is_supervise_sale=#{isSuperviseSale},
supervise_sale_user=#{superviseSaleUser},
sale_of_affirm_time=#{saleOfAffirmTime},
is_dismantle_affirm=#{isDismantleAffirm},
dismantle_affirm_time=#{dismantleAffirmTime},
dismantle_affirm_user_id=#{dismantleAffirmUserId},
is_delete=#{isDelete},
WHERE id=#{id} AND disintegrate_plant_id=#{disintegratePlantId}

mapper.update: UPDATE ts_car_processing set verify_result=#{verifyResult}, verify_time=#{verifyTime}, verify_user_id=#{verifyUserId}, record_number=#{recordNumber}, recycle_number=#{recycleNumber}, is_verify=#{isVerify} WHERE id=#{id} AND disintegrate_plant_id=#{disintegratePlantId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ts_car_processing WHERE id=#{id} AND disintegrate_plant_id=#{disintegratePlantId}
